trans-unit.source: Specifies the application ID (as a GUID) for this assembly.
trans-unit.target: 指定這個組件的應用程式識別碼 (稱為 GUID)。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ApplicationIDAttribute> takes a GUID in its constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ApplicationIDAttribute> 會在其建構函式中的 GUID。

trans-unit.source: When registration occurs, the components in the assembly are installed in an application with the given ID.
trans-unit.target: 註冊時，組件中的元件會安裝在具有指定 ID 的應用程式

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ApplicationIDAttribute> type.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ApplicationIDAttribute>型別。

trans-unit.source: The GUID associated with the COM+ application.
trans-unit.target: 與 COM+ 應用程式關聯的 GUID。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.EnterpriseServices.ApplicationIDAttribute" /> class specifying the GUID representing the application ID for the COM+ application.
trans-unit.target: 指定代表 COM+ 應用程式之應用程式識別碼的 GUID，初始化 <see cref="T:System.EnterpriseServices.ApplicationIDAttribute" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create a new <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ApplicationIDAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立新<xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ApplicationIDAttribute>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the GUID of the COM+ application.
trans-unit.target: 取得 COM+ 應用程式的 GUID。

trans-unit.source: The GUID representing the COM+ application.
trans-unit.target: 代表 COM+ 應用程式的 GUID。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ApplicationIDAttribute.Value%2A> is set by the constructor using the GUID passed in as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ApplicationIDAttribute.Value%2A> 設定使用 GUID 做為參數傳入建構函式。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to get the value of an `ApplicationID` attribute's <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ApplicationIDAttribute.Value%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何取得的值`ApplicationID`屬性的<xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ApplicationIDAttribute.Value%2A>屬性。
